chunks.content: Their hiatus saw the release of Beyoncé's debut album, Dangerously in Love (2003), which established her as a solo artist worldwide.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly states the release of Beyoncé's first solo album and the year it was released.
metadata.answer_contribution: It provides the specific information needed to answer the question about when Beyoncé released her first solo album.

required_info: release date of first solo album
